subject: No communication
description_text:
I would like to know of any update on my order

Order No:SSN2804

This is the second ticket I have raised and have had no communication what
so ever, We are now 9 days in and I have had nothing in respect to the
condition of my order which is not acceptable.

Please can you get back to me with the condition of my order, I do not wish
to get PayPal involved.

Regards
Reece

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 4552 中
